docs.text: Clone the repository : Git clone https : // github . com / DocKob / AllMyIT . git Or download the latest release : Invoke - WebRequest https : // github . com / DocKob / AllMyIT / releases / download / 1 . 0 . 0 / AllMyIT_Alpha_1 . 0 . 0 . zip - OutFile AllMyIT_Alpha_1 . 0 . 0 . zip Expand - Archive - LiteralPath C : \ Users \ AllMyIT \ Download \ AllMyIT_Alpha_1 . 0 . 0 . zip - DestinationPath C : \ Users \ AllMyIT \ Download \ AllMyIT Run AllMyIT cd C : \ Users \ AllMyIT \ Download \ AllMyIT Set - ExecutionPolicy Bypass - Scope Process - Force | . \ Install - Device . ps1 - Mode Computer - Verbose
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Config File How to build your config file. Install-Certificate "Install-Certificate" : { "Name" : "AllMyIT" , "Export" : true , "Password" : "Password" } Install-Modules "Install-Modules" : [ "PSWindowsUpdate" ] Install-Apps "Install-Apps" : { "AppsUrl" : [ "APP_URL" ], "Ninite" : [ "firefox" , "7zip" ], "Chocolatey" : [ "firefox" , "7zip" ] } Install-Features "Install-Features" : [ "Hyper-V" , "Hyper-V-PowerShell" , "Windows-Server-Backup" ] Set-Storage "Set-Storage" : true
